SEARCH
Package task.graphmodel

Interface Graph<V,E extends Number>

Type Parameters:
V - the type of data stored in the vertices
E - the type of weight associated with the edges (must extend Number)
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjacencyListGraph, AdjacencyMatrixGraph, IncedenceMatrixGraph
public interface Graph<V,E extends Number>
An interface representing a generic graph with vertices and edges.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Edge<V,E>
    addEdge(Vertex<V> from, Vertex<V> to, E weight)
    Adds a new edge with the specified source, destination vertices, and weight to the graph.
    Vertex<V>
    addVertex(V data)
    Adds a new vertex with the specified data to the graph.
    void
    changeEdge(Edge<V,E> edge, E newWeight)
    Changes the weight of the specified edge in the graph.
    void
    changeVertex(Vertex<V> node, V newName)
    Changes the data of the specified vertex in the graph.
    List<Edge<V,E>>
    getEdges()
    Gets a list of all edges in the graph.
    List<Edge<V,E>>
    getIncidentEdges(Vertex<V> node)
    Gets a list of outgoing edges from the specified vertex in the graph.

  • Method Details

    • addVertex

      Vertex<V> addVertex(V data)
      Adds a new vertex with the specified data to the graph.
      Parameters:
      data - the data to be stored in the new vertex
      Returns:
      the newly added vertex

    • removeVertex

      void removeVertex(Vertex<V> node)
      Removes the specified vertex from the graph.
      Parameters:
      node - the vertex to be removed

    • changeVertex

      void changeVertex(Vertex<V> node, V newName)
      Changes the data of the specified vertex in the graph.
      Parameters:
      node - the vertex whose data is to be changed
      newName - the new data to be assigned to the vertex

    • addEdge

      Edge<V,E> addEdge(Vertex<V> from, Vertex<V> to, E weight)
      Adds a new edge with the specified source, destination vertices, and weight to the graph.
      Parameters:
      from - the source vertex of the new edge
      to - the destination vertex of the new edge
      weight - the weight associated with the new edge
      Returns:
      the newly added edge

    • removeEdge

      void removeEdge(Edge<V,E> e)
      Removes the specified edge from the graph.
      Parameters:
      e - the edge to be removed

    • changeEdge

      void changeEdge(Edge<V,E> edge, E newWeight)
      Changes the weight of the specified edge in the graph.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge whose weight is to be changed
      newWeight - the new weight to be assigned to the edge

    • getVertices

      List<Vertex<V>> getVertices()
      Gets a list of all vertices in the graph.
      Returns:
      a list of vertices in the graph

    • getEdges

      List<Edge<V,E>> getEdges()
      Gets a list of all edges in the graph.
      Returns:
      a list of edges in the graph

    • getIncidentEdges

      List<Edge<V,E>> getIncidentEdges(Vertex<V> node)
      Gets a list of outgoing edges from the specified vertex in the graph.
      Parameters:
      node - the vertex for which to retrieve connected edges
      Returns:
      a list of edges connected to the specified vertex
